attributes.action: Reduce the prices that are applied for adults on public transport, or make a set price for everyone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should a 16 year old have to pay £1.80 but a 15 year old should only have to pay 90p?
Times are hard and having to pay almost £4 to get to and from town is an absolute joke.
I think that the prime minister should reconiser these prices and apply a set price!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
